entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as a person who discovered something about Harry's dreams.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who resumed talking and explained something to Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person who was obsessed with hearing the prophecy.

entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is mentioned as a person who worked in the Department of Mysteries before his arrest.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who had been dreaming about the door to the Department of Mysteries.

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is mentioned as a location where prophecies are kept.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as a location where prophecies are heavily protected.

entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: Occlumency is mentioned as a skill that Harry needs to master.

entities.name: prophecy
entities.description: The prophecy is mentioned as an object that Voldemort and Harry are interested in.

relationships.description: Voldemort was obsessed with hearing the prophecy.
Harry had been dreaming about the door to the Department of Mysteries.
Rookwood told Voldemort what they knew about the prophecies.
Dumbledore advised Harry to master Occlumency.
Voldemort would have to enter the Ministry of Magic and risk revealing himself at last.
